adrFormatAddress: 866 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10017-2905, USA

originalText.text: I went to Dr Lee for my eyelid surgery.  It was a great experience with Dr Lee and her staff.  On my first visit Dr Lee provided a very professional consultation which gave me the complete confidence and trust.  She did amazing work in my surgery.   Now I am still in recovery, but I am very satisfied and pleased with the result of my eyelid surgery and the follow up treatments.  I highly recommend Dr Lee for any plastic surgery you may be thinking of.  She is the best.  Trust her!

originalText.text: I don't usually write reviews - but I decided to, because of the quality consultation and results I received from Dr. Shinji Lee.  My issue - I had some signs of aging and asymmetry with my face that I wanted to take care of - sort of a "refresh".  I met with Dr. Lee and she listened intently to what I was not happy about and based on this - she spent time discussing the two options and addressing my concerns and questions.  She was patient and really helped me feel confident with my decision.  I decided to go with Sculptra - and we took a conservative approach.  Over the course of 4 months+  - I feel refreshed with both my issues (slight sag, asymmetry) corrected. Overall, the experience with Dr. Shinji Lee was positive and should I need future maintenance, she will be my first consideration.

originalText.text: Amazing doctor, both my mom and I went to Dr. Lee for our upper eyelids and she’s done nothing but take care of us. You can tell Dr. Lee and her staff genuinely care about the patients. Extremely satisfied with the results and would recommend her to anyone!

text.text: Amazing doctor, both my mom and I went to Dr. Lee for our upper eyelids and she’s done nothing but take care of us. You can tell Dr. Lee and her staff genuinely care about the patients. Extremely satisfied with the results and would recommend her to anyone!

originalText.text: Dr Lee was a pleasure to work with. I am very happy with my breast augmentation. I went to many doctors to consult before I made my decision and I felt most as ease with Dr Lee. I went from A to C cup. Throughout the whole process Dr. Lee was always available to chat about any of my concerns. She was always very thoughtful and knowledgeable. After one month post, they look very natural and I’m so pleased with my choice. Also the front desk receptionist is so kind and lovely. She speaks Chinese, Korean, and English. She really made me feel comfortable and reassured throughout the process!!

originalText.text: Dr. Lee did a wonderful upper eyelid surgery for me. She is very conservative and won’t perform surgical procedure if she thinks it will not come out well. She has a lovely manner as well and makes you feel very safe and secure.
